attributes.action: An NHS Thank you day, abit like remembrance Day as a thank you to there service.
attributes.additional_details: They have put so much on the line, like there own health and even lives, some not being able to see there families because of the covid pandemic and to those how suffered so much that some have taken there own lives and some staff still in poverty which is not right.
attributes.background: Set up a day a year to thank the NHS for there service through the years and during the covid-19 pandemic. A day set up like remembrance day but for the NHS for they deserve it.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make the NHS anniversary a public holiday, starting with Monday 5th July 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330234
